Key Match Events: Shohei Ohtani hit a three-run home run in the eighth inning
Enrique Hernandez homered in the sixth inning
Max Muncy homered to right field
Post-Match Reflections: The Mets need more action from Pete Alonso
Alonso struck out swinging in the first and momentum the rest of the game was missing
Miscellaneous Highlights: This was the largest shutout victory margin in Dodgers postseason history
Ohtani is 0-for-22 this postseason with the bases empty. When he has runners on, he is 7-for-9 with two homers and eight RBI.
The Mets had the bases loaded with one out in the bottom of the second but could not capitalize.
